title: FTX Employees Knew About the Backdoor to Alameda Months Before Collapse: WSJ
description: The employees flagged their discovery to one of FTX's director of engineering Nishad Singh but the problem never got fixed.

title: Volcano Energy Launches First Bitcoin Mining Pool in El Salvador
description: Volcano Energy, a renewable energy-focused Bitcoin mining company, has announced a strategic partnership with Luxor Technologies, a Bitcoin mining tech company, to launch Lava Pool, the first Salvadoran Bitcoin mining pool. Lava Pool will be harnessed by Volcano Energy, a company building a mining facility in Metapan. Volcano Energy Launches First Salvadoran Bitcoin Mining Pool […]

title: CMCC Global launches $100M fund to support blockchain start-ups in Asia
description: CMCC Global, a pro-crypto venture capital firm, has launched a $100 million fund to support blockchain start-ups in Hong Kong and across Asia

title: Former BlackRock Directors Forecast Bitcoin Spot ETF Greenlight Within Months
description: BlackRock’s spot Bitcoin ETF could potentially gain approval from the SEC within the next 3-6 months, according to former BlackRock executive Steven Schoenfield. The SEC’s shift in approach, seeking public feedback instead of issuing blanket denials for Bitcoin ETFs, and its recent legal loss to Grayscale, may hasten the approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs. The [...]

title: Day Two of SBF’s Trial: Witnesses Shed Light on Alleged Fraud
description:
On the second day of Sam Bankman-Fried’s trial, the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ) accused SBF of intentionally defrauding investors for personal gain, while the defense claimed that SBF only made “unsuccessful business decisions.” On Wednesday, October 4, Nathan Rehn, an assistant US attorney, described Bankman-Fried saying, “He had wealth, he had power, he had […]
